column5: 2015 with his wife by his side. frank served his country in the united states army. he was a farmer all of his life and worked for van's plumbing and heating until his retirement. frank was preceded in death by his first wife hazel. he is survived by his wife of 26 years
column16: 14 grandchildren and 27 great-grandchildren. visitation will be held 5:00 pm - 8:00 pm sunday
